SEARCH
Package ca.concordia.soen6441.project.gameplay

Class PlayerImpl

java.lang.Object
ca.concordia.soen6441.project.gameplay.PlayerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Player
public class PlayerImpl extends Object implements Player
The PlayerImpl class represents a player in the game, implementing the Player interface. It manages player properties, owned countries, orders, and reinforcements.
